content:
The head of the UK's defense department, Grant Chapsa commented on Ukraine's defeat of two more ships of the Cherno -Fleet of Russia.

Message heplacedIn the social network X.

"The illegal occupation of Ukraine by Putin causes great damage to the Black Sea Fleet of Russia, which is now functionally restricted," the Shapps Grant wrote.

He recalled that Russia was swimming in the Black Sea since 1783, but now forced to hide its fleet in ports. And even there, Putin's ships sink after the strikes of Ukraine's defense forces.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat the forces of Ukraine's defense have shot two Russian large landing ships.
title: Minister of Defense of Britain: Even in the ports of Putin's ships sink
description: He posted the message on the social network X. "The illegal occupation of Ukraine by Putin ...
author: Army Inform
